title: My Normal Just.. Stopped Itself?
body: I was playing a normal with a couple of friends for fun right, we were about 10-15 minutes through the game, I was afk farming top lane {{champion:41}}  then all the sudden one of my friends says, "wait guys I'm lagging, attempting to reconnect", all the sudden, the exact same thing appears on my screen, then it happens to all my friends as well. We all had exactly 500ms (we were talking over discord so we could talk to each other), our internet was fine, we thought maybe the entire league server had dropped. Me and my other friend left the game to attempt to reconnect but, we were just sent back to the main client screen, the game no longer existed. It wasn't in our match history either. What happened to this game??

replies.body: The server probably had an issue and everyone was DC'd. If no one is in a game, it just acts like it never existed. People used to intentionally DDoS the server to cause this to happen so they wouldn't get losses. Riot fixed this, as far as I know.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RzQLhZLa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-21T02:58:13.788+0000)
>
> The server probably had an issue and everyone was DC'd. If no one is in a game, it just acts like it never existed. People used to intentionally DDoS the server to cause this to happen so they wouldn't get losses. Riot fixed this, as far as I know.

Ok, thanks for the info.
